name: Wedding & Event Planning Site Template
description: Complete wedding and event planning website template with services, gallery, packages, and booking system, built using SEVDO frontend compiler
author: SEVDO Team

backend.description: FastAPI backend with PostgreSQL database for event management and bookings

pages.Hem.s: Romantic homepage with hero section, testimonials from couples, and featured services
pages.Tjanster.s: Complete wedding services including planning, coordination, decoration, and vendor management
pages.Galleri.s: Beautiful before/after wedding galleries showcasing transformations and past events
pages.Paket.s: Wedding packages with detailed pricing, inclusions, and customization options
pages.Kontakt.s: Contact information, consultation booking, and venue location details

features: Romantic and elegant design optimized for couples
Social media integration for inspiration sharing

installation.backend: Copy auth.py and wedding_models.py, configure database and payment gateway
installation.frontend: Compile .s files using SEVDO frontend compiler
installation.customization: Edit template.json values and wedding business details
